resources.string: Stay in the top 3 to advance to the next league.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

The app was made by Tomer Erusalimsky.

 It was inspired by a belief that the competitive nature of humankind
 can help humans achieve more in their day-to-day lives.


Please use it to enrich your life and make the most out of your day.
 Your time on this earth is limited, use every second of it wisely. :)


I would like to give thanks to the people who created many
 of the assets that are used within this app:


The beautiful icons were provided by "Icons8".
 You can check their site here.
 The amazing "Ta Da" sound was take from "SoundBible".
 Please pay them a visit here.
 The absolutely gorgeous and intuitive ProgressView was made by "skydoves".
 You can see his work here.
 And last, but, not least - the engaging and cute "LottieAlertDialog" was made by "Mayuce".
 You can check him out "here".
Streak Freeze allows your streak to remain in place for one full day of inactivity.
Double your 50 coins wager by maintaining a 7 day streak.
